titles.title: Postal Responsibility Act of 1988
A bill to permit claims to be brought against the United States Postal Service based on the loss, miscarriage, or negligent transmission of letters and certain other postal matter.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Administrative Law and Governmental Relations.

bill.summary: 5/12/1988--Introduced. Postal Responsibility Act of 1988 - Permits claims to be brought against the United States Postal Service based on the loss, miscarriage, or negligent transmission of first class mail and express mail.
